mapper.sql: id, type, subtype, location, host, owner, ownerid, ownerphone, unit, floor, doornumber, employee, expend
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_house (id, type, subtype, location, host, owner, ownerid, ownerphone, unit, floor, doornumber, employee, expend) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{subtype}, #{location}, #{host}, #{owner}, #{ownerid}, #{ownerphone}, #{unit}, #{floor}, #{doornumber}, #{employee}, #{expend}, #{addtime}, #{updatetime})
mapper.update: update t_house set type = #{type}, subtype = #{subtype}, location = #{location}, host = #{host}, owner = #{owner}, ownerid = #{ownerid}, ownerphone = #{ownerphone}, unit = #{unit}, floor = #{floor}, doornumber = #{doornumber}, employee = #{employee}, expend = #{expend}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
